"Ok" replied the femme while she trasformed to her robot mode "I need 
a break"

She flew towards her battle field.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> OOC: Lol! This is fun! Looks like no one is going to back off! What 
> about we post pone it until after the battle at Tripred's?
> 
> BIC: Vlad had to admit she was a superbe warrior. Her skill were 
honed 
> to a almost Clanlike perfection and she could take a lot of 
punishment 
> without even flinching. This trial could go on for days.
> 
> Then, his onboard computer warned him of weapon fire far away. He 
> assumed this was the Tripredacus base.
> 
> Vlad: I detect combat and I believe the Tripredacus are attacked. I 
> suggest we delay this Trial until after we have defended the base. 
Do 
> you agree, quiaff?
> 
> All the while, though, he had not left a combat stance. It was not 
a 
> Clansman's way to be left unprepared at any time.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:

> >

fire
